name: Shadowskin
description: Having a thin, transparent spiritual membrane for a body, gives them night vision, but as they are weaker than most, they are missing four hearts. So too do they disappear into the shade when standing in unlit areas. Attacking them, however, changes their delicate biology, causing them to glow and gain speed 1 in retaliation for a few seconds. Being above y0 completely disables this ability, however, their body defaulting to 50% seethrough.
